timeline.bodyText: Can you add some log lines please that we're detaching the disk or fi we're not doing anything as it's already attached.
timeline.author: keyki

replies.bodyText: Detaching has the log in detachDiskFromVm() method, attaching in attachDiskToVm()
replies.author: pdarvasi

timeline.bodyText: Can you add a logline that the disk already exists and we're not doing anything.
timeline.author: keyki

timeline.bodyText: Can you change it to 60 please?
timeline.author: keyki

timeline.bodyText: We should at least log if RESOURCE_CRN_PARAMETER is not set in the stack, that should never happen, right?
timeline.author: pdarvasi

timeline.bodyText: Not scope of PR, but detaching and attaching could be done parallel for multiple volumes if they are longish-running
timeline.author: pdarvasi

replies.bodyText: Could you please raise a jira ticket about this improvement?
replies.author: schfeca75

timeline.bodyText: We should log all the generated resource names here.
timeline.author: pdarvasi

replies.bodyText: The resourceName() method is extended with the logging.
replies.author: schfeca75

timeline.bodyText: minor typo: it has thrown --> it has been thrown
timeline.author: pdarvasi

timeline.bodyText: I would pass the cut length as param instead of always taking DATE_FORMAT.length
timeline.author: pdarvasi
